prompts.title: Abandoned Cart Email
prompts.description: Crafts a prompt which can be used to remind customers about abandoned cart items.
prompts.prompt_text:
Subject Line: “Re: Your Abandoned Cart – Don’t Forget Your Favorites! 🛒”  
 Body Prompt: “Remind customers of items they’ve left in their shopping cart, providing a gentle nudge to complete their purchase and offering assistance if needed.”

prompts.title: Improve Your Sales Copy
prompts.description: Ask GPT to improve something by giving an objective to improve.
prompts.prompt_text: Can you provide suggestions for how I can improve [subject] with the goal of [objective]?
